events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The issue has been assessed and categorized under Delivery Delay due to the customer's complaint about the late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Amy Rodriguez for further investigation regarding the delayed order.
Hello! My name is Amy, and I'll be assisting you today. I understand your order has not arrived yet and Iâ€™m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please confirm your order number and the shipping address so I can check the current status with our logistics partner?
Sure, the order number is ORD123456789 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. Please let me know if you need anything else.

Thank you for the information. I have contacted the courier service, and they informed me that your package was delayed due to unexpected weather conditions. They expect delivery within the next 3 days.
I understand the weather can cause issues, but I really needed the package sooner. This delay is quite frustrating as I was relying on the delivery for an upcoming event.
I apologize for the inconvenience. To make up for the delay, I would like to offer you free expedited shipping on your next order and a 10% discount coupon for your troubles.
Thank you for the offer and your help. I appreciate the discount and will consider placing another order in the future. Thanks for keeping me updated!
The issue is now resolved with the customer informed of the expected delivery window and offered compensation for the delay. We will monitor the package until delivery.
Just checking in to confirm your package has arrived safely. Please let us know if you need any further assistance or support.
The case has been formally closed following confirmation of successful delivery and customer satisfaction with the resolution provided.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience and overall handling of the delivery delay issue.
